## [v0.2.0](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/tree/v0.2.0) (2025-11-20)

[Compare Changes](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0)

**New Features:**

  - EBNF Parser should NOT produce new conflicts in the grammar [#97](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/issues/97) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))

**Enhancements:**

  - Support COMMENT parsing to fixtures. [#108](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/issues/108) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - The getFood() method in the command package is unused [#99](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/issues/99) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Sanitize the code-generation templates [#98](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/issues/98) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Isolate os.Exit call [#107](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/issues/107) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Remove ^ and $ from regular expressions [#103](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/issues/103) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))

**Merged Changes:**

  - Generate examples [#111](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/111) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Remove extra space from code templates [#110](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/110) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Refactor os.Exit call [#109](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/109) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Update README file [#106](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/106) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - regex: remove start of string and end of string anchors [#104](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/104) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Fix regex parser [#102](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/102) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Expand Optional and Group operators [#101](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/101) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Fix regular expression grammar and parser [#100](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/100) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Generate parser [#95](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/95) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Generate lexer DFA graph when debug is true [#94](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/94) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Update pre-defined regular expressions [#93](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/93) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))

  - Update algo module version [#88](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/88) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
  - Support Unicode Parsing using Range-Based Automata [#87](https://github.com/gardenbed/emerge/pull/87) ([moorara](https://github.com/moorara))
